name: Found In Space
description:
After narrowly escaping doom on the purple planet, you find yourself endlessly drifting in space. After being abruptly picked up by a passing craft, all that's left to do is figure out how to make sense of the interior of your new shelter.

CONTROLS (This game requires a dual-analog controller):

Left and Right Analog sticks - Left and Right arm movement

Left and Right Shoulder bumpers - Hold to grab with Left and Right hands

A (XBox) / X (PlayStation) - Bend and extend legs
